sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Segment, Item, Icon, List, Button } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import EventListAttendee from './EventListAttendee' import format from 'date-fns/format' class EventListItem extends Component { render() { const {event, deleteEvent} = this.props return ( {event.title} Hosted by {event.hostedBy} {format(event.date, 'dddd Do MMMM')} at {format(event.date, 'HH:mm')}| {event.venue} {event.attendees && Object.values(event.attendees).map((attendee, index) => ( ))} {event.description}
